rows.label: qev087102_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm, fascinating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0002
rows.name: Find something useful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0003
rows.name:
All intelligence is useful, Colonel.
It's just a matter of finding the best lens to view it through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0004
rows.name: Wow. That's deep, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0005
rows.name:
If I'm not mistaken, you've fought against
a Wrothian squadron before, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0006
rows.name: Wrothian? Tatsu hear that name someplace before...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_JNK0010
rows.name: Remember

rows.label: qev087102_SEL0011
rows.name: Recall that those were the lion-esque people.

rows.label: qev087102_JNK0020
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: qev087102_SEL0021
rows.name: Describe them as a proud and fierce people.

rows.label: qev087102_JNK0030
rows.name: Grumble

rows.label: qev087102_SEL0031
rows.name: Claim they're a bunch of conniving furballs.

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0007
rows.name:
Warriors through and through.
The sort you don't want for enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0008
rows.name: Hmm... Not ringing any bells...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0009_m
rows.name:
That describes Tatsu perfectly!
Is friend sure they're not thinking of Tatsu?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0009_f
rows.name:
That describes Tatsu perfectly!
Is friend sure they're not thinking of Tatsu?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0010
rows.name: Hmm... When did we fight folks like Tatsu...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0011
rows.name: Meh! Tatsu dislike them already from the description alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0012
rows.name: Sounds more like the Nopon to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0013
rows.name: Hmm? Then what Wrothians like?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0014
rows.name: Come on! We fought them in Sylvalum, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, right! Tatsu remember now. Kitty-cat people, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0016
rows.name:
We've analyzed FrontierNav records
for evidence of Ganglion infighting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0017
rows.name:
Every instance has involved Wrothians
fighting against one race or another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0018
rows.name: This is more than just a few simple disagreements.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0019
rows.name: We believe they've broken ties with the Ganglion entirely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0019_2
rows.name: And on less than amicable terms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_JNK0040
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev087102_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest forming an alliance.

rows.label: qev087102_JNK0050
rows.name: Assert

rows.label: qev087102_SEL0051
rows.name:
Claim this is your chance to wipe
the Wrothians out for good.

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0020
rows.name: If they really have left the Ganglion, that might be a possibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0021
rows.name: Their motives certainly seemed different enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0022
rows.name: If their values align with ours...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0023
rows.name: That's one way to view the situation, certainly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0024
rows.name:
What? No! If they're fighting the Ganglion,
they're not our enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0025
rows.name:
That's right. Only a fool goes around
picking unnecessary fights.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0026
rows.name:
The Wrothians seem to have different
motives than the other Ganglion races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0027
rows.name: If their values align with ours, why not join forces?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0028
rows.name:
As we often said on Earth,
the enemy of my enemy is my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0029
rows.name:
I expect an alliance with the Wrothians
would prove beneficial for both of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0030
rows.name: Agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0031
rows.name:
Even beyond the practical merits, it just makes sense
for us to try and make as many friends as possible here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0032
rows.name: Which brings me to your next mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0033
rows.name:
I need you to travel to the site of the
latest clash and gather data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087102_MSG0034
rows.name: Yes, sir.[ST:wait ]
